original: Idamavoca bhagavā magadhesu viharanto pāsāṇake cetiye, paricārakasoḷasānaṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ ajjhiṭṭho puṭṭho puṭṭho pañhaṁ byākāsi.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavā magadhesu viharantaḥ pāsāṇake cetiye paricāraka soḷasānam brāhmaṇānam ajjhiṭṭhaḥ puṭṭhaḥ puṭṭhaḥ pañham byākāsi

original: Ekamekassa cepi pañhassa atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammaṁ paṭipajjeyya, gaccheyyeva jarāmaraṇassa pāraṁ.
analyzed: ekam ekassa ce pi pañhassa attham aññāya dhammam aññāya dhamma anudhammam paṭipajjeyya gaccheyya iva jarā maraṇassa pāra
